item.title: Chinna Thayaval: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This sad song is also from the movie Thalapathy. Just like Sundari Kannal oru Sethiand Yamunai Atrile. (Thanks to my dad for corrections.) In this movie, RajaniÂ´s character was abandoned on a train by his mum as a baby.
